metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000211 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Doorkeeper version 4.2.0 and later contains a Incorrect Access Controlvulnerability in Token revocation API's authorized method that can resultin Access tokens are not revoked for public OAuth apps, leaking accessuntil expiry.

criterions.comment: ruby-doorkeeper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
